page.title: 09FARM LIFE
page.content: The eerie barn is dark and musty,cobwebby and old. Reddish brown pantiles rest on crumbly bricks and wood. In the barn a dank hay smell fills the air,but the farm is brightly painted white. A welcoming smell awaits anyone who enters the house.A happy,smiling farmer's wife is always glad to have your company.The farm is deep in the country and across fields swaying green crops. Mooing cows,baaing sheep and the crying of the lamb are all farmyard noises.A large combine harvester is waiting silently,ready for harvest time. KELLY THE SHEEP DOG.- Snarling,growling sheep dog with gnashing great teeth.Always jumping up at strangers.Sometimes chasing farm cats,rounding up sheep into the pens,scampering around having fun.
